description: Dashboard for Spring Boot2 Statistics(by micrometer-prometheus).This is a fork of dashboard 6756, fixed for Spring Boot 2.3 and support for Jetty instead of Tomcat.

targets.expr: irate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{instance="$instance", application="$application", exception="none", uri!~".*actuator.*"}[60m]) / irate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{instance="$instance", application="$application", exception="none", uri!~".*actuator.*"}[60m])

title: Статистика Spring boot приложения
